/usr/bin/c++   -std=c++11  -rdynamic   -o OMP_EX -Wl,-rpath,/home/oohnohnoh1/anaconda3/lib src/libsrc.a -lm -lcppunit /home/oohnohnoh1/anaconda3/lib/libmpichcxx.so /home/oohnohnoh1/anaconda3/lib/libmpich.so /home/oohnohnoh1/anaconda3/lib/libopa.so /home/oohnohnoh1/anaconda3/lib/libmpl.so -lrt -lpthread libgsllib.a -L/home/noh/anaconda3/pkgs/gsl-2.1-2/lib/ -Wl,-Bstatic -lgsl -lgslcblas -Wl,-Bdynamic -lgomp -lpthread
